name: Zeneca's Journey
description:
Join 6B1432 mission to protect their host against covid. Your task will be to guide 6B1432 across its journey inside their human.

Control layout

  • Player movement: A|W|S|D
  • Jump & double jump: Space bar
  • Camera movement: Mouse

Team

  • 3D Art
    • Lucia Dahir
    • Ignacio Gera Palilla
  • Game design and programming
    • Ariel Winkler
    • Lautaro Falco
    • Gabriel Corbani

Submission for Ludum Dare 49
